Class Fish

  • java.lang.Object
    • AquariumObject
      • Creature
        • Fish

    public abstract class Fish
extends Creature

      • Fish

        public Fish(Aquarium aquarium,
            float speed,
            float eatRadius)
        Constructor: instantiate fish at random position.
        Parameters:
        aquarium - object aquarium which will be added by fish and will be initialized
        speed - fish speed which will be initialized
        eatRadius - fish eat radius which will be initialized

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Do one game time unit. Dies if gameTime is greater than or equals the last time this fish eats plus the duration of this fish full before hungry again plus the duration of this fish hungry before it dies
        Overrides:
        tick in class AquariumObject
